scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:services"
scripts.dev:services: npm run dev:media & npm run dev:jobs & npm run dev:billing
scripts.build: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:web && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: npm run build --workspace=services/media-storage && npm run build --workspace=services/background-jobs
scripts.setup:db: npm run prisma:generate --workspace=packages/gateway && npm run prisma:migrate --workspace=packages/gateway
